title: American Classic is back with road, gravel tires and a tiny price tag
content:
A classic is back â€” an American Classic, to be specific. The revered cycling company shuttered in 2018 after 35 years in the industry. But now American Classic returns with a brand refresh, and a new tire lineup that includes road and gravel rubber. The road lineup includes the Timekeeper race tire and the Torchbearer

The post American Classic is back with road, gravel tires and a tiny price tag appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Dan Cavallari
